conclusion: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF EKBATANI v. SWEDEN - [Russian Translation]
externalsources: Explanatory Report to Protocol no. 7 to the European Convention on Human Rights (Document H (84) 5 rev. pp. 9, 13, paras. 18, 43)
